actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Reported to House from the Committee on Ways and Means, H. Rept. 94-301.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.
Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Finance with amendment, S. Rept. 94-445.
Placed on calendar in Senate under Subjects on the Table.

official_title: A bill to extend for an additional temporary period the existing suspension of duties on certain classifications of yarns of silk.

summary.text: (Reported to Senate from the Committee on Finance with amendment, S. Rept. 94-445) Extends until June 30, 1978, the existing suspension of duties under the U.S. Tariff Schedules on specified classifications of yarns of silk. Excludes from gross income, under the Internal Revenue Code, the interest on governmental obligations for specified irrigation dams. Excludes from gross income, under the Code, earnings dervied from payments by a common carrier for the use on a temporary basis of railroad rolling stock owned by a foreign corporation which grants an equivalent exemption to a domestic corporation.

titles.title: A bill to extend for an additional temporary period the existing suspension of duties on certain classifications of yarns of silk.
